Privateer

Tier 2 Exploration Light Naval Unit. Has the [icon:UNIT_CAUTION] Pirate Ability. Can cross borders of other Civilizations, [icon:Action_Pillage] Plunder Trade Routes between non-Allied Civilizations, and attack Units of non-Allied Civilizations without going to [icon:WAR] War. Defeating a unit with the Privateer provides [icon:YIELD_GOLD]Gold equal to 100% of that unit's [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.

Tier 3 Exploration Light Naval Unit. Has the [icon:UNIT_CAUTION] Pirate Ability. Can cross borders of other Civilizations, [icon:Action_Pillage] Plunder Trade Routes between non-Allied Civilizations, and attack Units of non-Allied Civilizations without going to [icon:WAR] War. Defeating a unit with the Privateer provides [icon:YIELD_GOLD]Gold equal to 100% of that unit's [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
Can cross borders of other Civilizations.
Can plunder [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes between non-Allied Civilizations.
Can attack Units of non-Allied Civilizations without going to [icon:WAR] War. Defeating a unit with the Privateer provides Gold equal to 100% of that unit's Combat Strength.

Mamluk

Abbasid Unique Cavalry Unit. When stationed in your territory, receive +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for every [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Urban Population in that Settlement. Ignores Zone of Control. Has lower [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength than other Cavalry Units.

Tier 1 Abbasid Unique Cavalry Unit. When stationed in or occupying a Settlement, receive +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for every [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Urban Population in that Settlement. Ignores Zone of Control. Has lower [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength than other Tier 1 Cavalry Units.

Tier 2 Abbasid Unique Cavalry Unit. When stationed in or occupying a Settlement, receive +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for every [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Urban Population in that Settlement. Ignores Zone of Control. Has lower [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength than other Tier 2 Cavalry Units.

Has lower [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength than other Tier 3 Cavalry Units.
